description: Listed only by Maclean, who describes it as �a Glockenspiel with re-iterating (repeating) action in the Wurlitzer Theatre-Organ.�
examplesDescription: Osiris contains seven example, three of which are from Wurlitzer organs.

examples.name: Bells, Percusion Chamber; Emery Theatre, Cincinnati, Ohio, USA; Wurlitzer (restored).
Glockenspiel/Bells; Paramount Theatre, Oakland, California, USA; Wurlitzer 1925. Originally from Capitol Theatre, Detroit, Michigan.
Glockenspiel/Bells; RKO Palace, Rochester, New York, USA; Wurlitzer.
